Question
========

A randomly selected sample of 560 people filled in a questionnaire about their attitude towards a newly implemented law.  A total of 300 participants indicated to be positive, whereas the others were negative.  Calculate, based on this sample, the 95% confidence interval for the proportion of people that are positive about this new law.

  
Answerlist
----------
* (0.494 , 0.577) 
* (0.501,  0.570)
* (0.488,  0.583)
* (0.479,  0.592)


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
